overview:
A creative and dynamic executive with over 11 years of marketing and tech startup experience, with established success creating and implementing innovative product roadmaps that lead to exponential revenue growth.

Passions: Developing mobile marketing apps, product development, monetization strategies, leadership, partnership opportunties and most importantly: technology products that change the way we interact with the world we live in.

Latest Tech Projects: Director of Business Development at Yodle. Kevin will lead all product, distribution, and channel partnership opportunities for the fastest growing local online advertising platform, Yodle.

Started Deal Current Network in late 2009 and today it’s one of the fastest growing and leading white label social commerce software solution used by 200+ media publishers and 1000+ affiliates throughout the U.S. and Canada. In April, Kevin became an Advisor for the Deal Current Network.

Before that was at Active.com, which at the time was a small consumer technology and media web property that helps people find activities and events to participate in throughout the world. Started there with about 400 employees but now they top 3,000 and recently went public at a $700M market cap. Active acquired 20+ companies during his tenure, giving him incredible experience with product integrations and market strategies relating to consumer technologies.

Other Interests: marathons, Ironman, triathlons Member of San Diego Tri Club Member of Toastmasters International Team Captain of ING New York City Marathon: Run For Something Better Charity Technology and web trend blogger

Specialties Technology development, product management, brand marketing, corporate strategy, acquisition analysis and marketing implementation, community development, and successful leadership qualities.
